accounts.name: authority
docs: signator of transaction

instructions.name: startRoundShortOptions
docs: * start next epoch. opens transfer window and adjusts FSM state

instructions.name: setNextOption
docs: * sets the next option market this volt will trade

instructions.name: resetOptionMarket
docs: * resets option market on the volt

instructions.name: rebalancePrepare
docs: * prepares to invest in the current options market. For covered calls, this would involve minting

instructions.name: rebalanceSwapPremium
docs: * swap from premium to underlying. for covered calls, would swap USDC -> BTC/SOL/etc.

accounts.name: market
docs: Serum Market Account
admin instruction so no attack vector

instructions.name: rebalanceEnter
docs: * enter options position. buys/sells on serum

accounts.name: market
docs: Serum Market Account
admin instruction so no attack vector

accounts.name: market
docs: The Serum Market

accounts.name: openOrders
docs: The vault's OpenOrders account

accounts.name: serumMarketAuthority
docs: The Serum Market market authority

instructions.name: rebalanceSettle
docs: * settles the current options position. redeems writer tokens for underlying or quote asset.

instructions.name: endRoundShortOptions
docs: * ends current epoch. settles pending deposits & withdrawals.

accounts.name: entropyProgram

accounts.name: authority
docs: signator of transaction

instructions.name: deposit
docs: * deposits into volt, receives volt tokens or a receipt for a pending deposit

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: NOTE: this is a vector of pubkeys that can interact with the volt, NOT related to the whitelist MM token

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: * withdraws from volt. receives underlying or a receipt for a pending withdrawal

accounts.name: nonPayerAuthority
docs: if is authority on token accounts (aka === authority_check), should be a signer

accounts.name: authorityCheck
docs: should be equal to 1 of authority or non_payer_authority

accounts.name: authorityCheck
docs: should be equal to 1 of authority or non_payer_authority

instructions.name: cancelPendingDeposit
docs: * cancels a users pending deposit

instructions.name: cancelPendingWithdrawal
docs: * cancels a users pending withdrawal

instructions.name: claimPendingDeposit
docs: * claims volt tokens from a previously pending deposit

instructions.name: claimPendingWithdrawal
docs: * claims underlying from a previously pending withdrawal

instructions.name: initSerumMarket
docs: * initialize serum market for the current option token

fields.name: hedgingPerpMarket
docs: pubkey of perp market to hedge

accounts.name: PendingDeposit
docs:
* User-specific PDA. Tracks information about their pending deposits.
 *  NOTES:
 *  1. There may only be one pending deposit (across all rounds) at any point in time
 *  2. However, pending deposits will accumulate if made in same round.
 *  3. Pending deposits from previous rounds may be claimed with the instruction "claim_pending"

accounts.name: PendingWithdrawal
docs:
* User-specific PDA. Tracks information about their pending withdrawals.
 *  NOTES:
 *  1. There may only be one pending withdrawal (across all rounds) at any point in time
 *  2. However, pending withdrawals will accumulate if made in same round.
 *  3. Pending withdrawals from previous rounds may be claimed with the instruction "claim_pending_withdrawal"

accounts.name: Round
docs:
* Epoch-specific PDA. Stores all information specific to that epoch.
 * New rounds are initialized in start_round.
 * Modified in deposit, withdraw, claim_pending, claim_pending_withdrawal

fields.name: underlyingAmountPerContract
docs: The amount of the **underlying asset** that derives a single option

fields.name: expirationUnixTimestamp
docs: The Unix timestamp at which the contracts in this market expire

fields.name: haveTakenWithdrawalFees
docs: A flag to set and use to when running a memcmp query.
This will be set when Serum markets are closed and expiration is validated

fields.name: addresses
docs: The storage for information on reserves in the market
